About Sweet Bites

Sweet Bites is a family-owned bakery dedicated to bringing you freshly baked cakes, breads, and pastries made with love.

Our Story

Founded in 2025, Sweet Bites started with a passion for baking and a dream to serve happiness through delicious treats.

Our Promise

We use high-quality ingredients and traditional recipes to ensure every bite is memorable and satisfying.
